ActivityMetadata.Name: GH Start a user migration
ActivityMetadata.Label: GH Start a user migration
ActivityMetadata.Description: Initiates the generation of a user migration archive.
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Github

Start a user migration

Initiates the generation of a user migration archive.

Method: Post

OperationID: migrations/start-for-authenticated-user

EndPoint:

/user/migrations
